FuncDef: The display issu rollback-timer command displays the time left before the rollback timer expires.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring a rollback timer using the issu start rollback-timer command, you can run the display issu rollback-timer command to view the time left before the rollback timer expires. The time information helps determine whether the duration for an ISSU is sufficient or the duration for verifying feature running status in the target version is sufficient.
You can change the value of the ISSU rollback timer using the issu reset rollback-timer command.
Prerequisites
rollback-timer has been configured in the issu start [ rollback-timer ] command.An ISSU is ongoing.

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
